fields.headline: What's on when
fields.bodyText: Bath International Music Festival Date: May 18 - June 3 Location: Various venues, Bath Description: Classical, contemporary, jazz and world music at a range of venues around the city - along with parties, workshops, silent film screenings and more. Contact: 01225 463362 E-mail: boxoffice@bath festivals.org.uk Link: www.bathmusicfest.org.uk/ Cannes Film Festival Date: May 9-20. Location: Cannes, France. Description: Starlets on the beach, glamour on the screens and film reputations on the line at the world's most prestigious film festival. Contact: 0033 (0) 4 93 39 01 01 Link: www.whatsonwhen.com/events/~21731.jml Jerez Horse Fair Date: May 13-20. Location: Jerez de la Frontera, Andalucia, Spain. Description: A fully-fledged equestrian ballet from Spain's most highly trained four-legged friends, flamenco dancing and a bullfight or two. Not to mention gallons of sherry at this Andalucian fiesta. Contact: Jerez Tourism Office 00 34 (0) 956359465 Link: www.whatsonwhen.com/events/~30939.jml Mike the Headless Chicken Day Date: May 18-19. Location: Fruita, Colorado, US. Description: Mike the Chicken (born1945) lived for 18 months without a head after a narrow escape with an axe. He is remembered with a 5km headless chicken race in farmville Fruita. Contact: Colorado Tourism Authority, 001 303 892 3885 Link: www.whatsonwhen.com/events/~52854.jml Mount Hagen Festival Date: May 18-20. Location: Mount Hagen, Papua New Guinea. Description: You don't get much more remote than this: the wild frontier district of the Papua New Guinea highlands invites its tribal clans to perform head- hunting dances in full feather and grass-skirt regalia. Contact: Papua New Guinea Tourist Office www.paradiselive.org.pg/t Link: www.whatsonwhen.com/events/~31325.jml.
